TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit JsonReaderWriterFactory extends System.Object
public ref class JsonReaderWriterFactory abstract sealed

summary.span: 產生 的執行個體，這個執行個體可以從資料流或緩衝區中讀取以 JavaScript 物件標記法 (JSON) 編碼的資料，並將其對應至 XML Infoset 以及 的執行個體，這個執行個體可以將 XML Infoset 對應至 JSON 並將 JSON 編碼的資料寫入至資料流。

span.span: Produces instances of that can read data encoded with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) from a stream or buffer and map it to an XML Infoset and instances of that can map an XML Infoset to JSON and write JSON-encoded data to a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 可使用 JSON 資料和 XML Infoset 之間的對應來處理 JSON 訊息。 processes JSON messages using a mapping between JSON data and the XML Infoset. 一般而言，這個對應會在檢視中隱藏起來。Normally, this mapping is hidden from view. 不過，在某些進階案例中可能需要手動轉換 JSON 和 XML。However, in some advanced scenarios it may be necessary to manually convert between JSON and XML. 在此情況下， 類別可用來建立必要的 XML 讀取器和寫入器。In this case, the class can be used to create the necessary XML readers and writers. 請注意，並非所有的 XML Infoset 項目都可以對應至 JSON。Note that not every XML Infoset element can be mapped to JSON. 如需對應的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 序列化和還原序列化 JSON 資料](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-serialize-and-deserialize-json-data.md)。For more information about mapping, see [How to: Serialize and Deserialize JSON Data](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-serialize-and-deserialize-json-data.md).

summary.span: 建立 ，它可將以 JavaScript 物件標記法 (JSON) 編碼的資料流或緩衝區對應至 XML Infoset。

span.span: Creates an that can map - streams or buffers encoded with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) to an XML Infoset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個多載都會使用 來避免在讀取不受信任的資料時遇到阻斷服務 (DoS) 攻擊。Each of the overloads uses a to prevent Denial of Service (DoS) attacks when reading untrusted data. 如需有關使用以防止阻絕服務攻擊，讀取不受信任的資料時，請參閱[資料的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/security-considerations-for-data.md)。For more information about using to prevent Denial of Service attacks when reading untrusted data, see [Security Considerations for Data](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/security-considerations-for-data.md).

Public Shared Function CreateJsonReader (buffer As Byte(), quotas As XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas) As XmlDictionaryReader

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要從其中讀取的輸入 緩衝區陣列。

span.span: The input buffer array from which to read.

param.name: quotas
param.span: 在讀取不受信任的資料時，用來防止阻絕服務攻擊的 。

span.span: The used to prevent Denial of Service attacks when reading untrusted data.

summary.span: 建立 ，它可將以 JavaScript 物件標記法 (JSON) 編碼的緩衝區對應至 XML Infoset。

span.span: Creates an that can map buffers encoded with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) to an XML Infoset.

returns.span: 可以處理 JavaScript 物件標記法 (JSON) 資料的 。

span.span: An that can process JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載不會接受 參數。This overload does not accept an parameter. 讀取資料時會自動偵測字元編碼 (UTF-8、Unicode 或位元組由大到小的 Unicode)。The character encoding (UTF-8, Unicode or Big-Endian Unicode) is auto-detected when the data is read. 如需有關使用以防止阻絕服務攻擊，讀取不受信任的資料時，請參閱[資料的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/security-considerations-for-data.md)。For more information about using to prevent Denial of Service attacks when reading untrusted data, see [Security Considerations for Data](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/security-considerations-for-data.md).

summary.span: 建立 ，它可以將具有指定大小和位移以及字元編碼、以 JavaScript 物件標記法 (JSON) 編碼的緩衝區對應至 XML Infoset。

returns.span: 可以讀取 JavaScript 物件標記法 (JSON) 的 。

span.span: An that can read JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用以防止阻絕服務攻擊，讀取不受信任的資料時，請參閱[資料的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/security-considerations-for-data.md)。For more information about using to prevent Denial of Service attacks when reading untrusted data, see [Security Considerations for Data](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/security-considerations-for-data.md).

summary.span: 建立 ，將經過 JSON 編碼的資料寫入至資料流。

span.span: Creates an that writes data encoded with JSON to a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 靜態方法會傳回 的執行個體，這個執行個體可以將 XML Infoset 對應至 JSON 資料流。The static method returns an instance of an that can map an XML Infoset to a JSON stream. 不保證會產生有效的 JSON。The is not guaranteed to produce valid JSON. 如果以 JSON-XML 對應不支援的方式來使用，可能會擲回例外狀況或寫入無效的 JSON 文件。If it is used in a way not supported by the JSON-XML mapping, it may either throw an exception or write an invalid JSON document.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter CreateJsonWriter (System.IO.Stream stream);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter CreateJsonWriter(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed
public: static System::Xml::XmlDictionaryWriter ^ CreateJsonWriter(System::IO::Stream ^ stream);

param.name: stream
param.span: JSON 寫入器的輸出 。

span.span: The output for the JSON writer.

summary.span: 建立 ，將經過 JSON 編碼的資料寫入至資料流。

span.span: Creates an that writes data encoded with JSON to a stream.

returns.span: ，會將經過 JSON 編碼的資料寫入至以 XML Infoset 為基礎的資料流。

span.span: An that writes data encoded with JSON to the stream based on an XML Infoset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的字元編碼為 UTF-8。The default character encoding is UTF-8. 當寫入器已關閉時，資料流也會關閉。When the writer is closed, the stream is closed as well.
